channel.title: 508 npc talking/shouting

item.title: 508 npc talking/shouting
item.dc:creator: @propaganda propaganda
item.description:
@propaganda wrote:

does anyone know how to make npcs talk in 508? ive read a tut, but it was an old tut for 508.
if you could help id gladly rep ya!
or if you could send me an example from your

/** * Request text for this NPC. * @param message The message to make the NPC say. */ public void requestText(String message) { speakText = message; animUpdateReq = true; speakTextUpdateReq = true; }
thanks! its in npc.java btw
src>palidino76>rs2>npcs ;D
btw its in pker time 508 so if you have it, please send me the code above, and a few lines underneath with the npc talking stuff, thanks!

Read full topic
